title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 241.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 241.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to: (a) any person who applies, supplies, sells, offers for sale, or manufactures any asphalt pavement; and
(b) any person who applies, supplies, sells, offers for sale, or manufactures any asphalt-based surface
coating. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
241.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
